mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge(num, name, subName, content, challengePeriod, calorie, challengeFilename, video) VALUES(#{num}, #{name}, #{subName}, #{content}, #{challengePeriod}, #{calorie, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{challengeFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{video, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INSERT INTO challenge2(exNum, num, startDate, endDate, exContent) VALUES(#{exNum}, #{num}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{exContent})
mapper.select:
SELECT c.num, name, subName, challengePeriod, challengeFilename, TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, NVL(playMember, 0) playMember FROM challenge c LEFT OUTER JOiN( SELECT num, COUNT(*) playMember FROM userChallenge GROUP BY num ) u ON c.num = u.num
ORDER BY c.num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
